cannotEraseOthersPixels: You can only erase your own pixels!
helpBasicOperationsText:
🎨 Color Selection: Click palette colors or use custom color picker to create personalized colors
🖌️ Pixel Drawing: Click anywhere on canvas to place 16x16 pixel blocks (optimized to 2x size)
🧽 Eraser Tool: Select eraser tool to precisely remove your own pixels while protecting others' work
🎯 Color Picker: Extract colors from canvas or screen with real-time preview and magnifier effects
📋 Color History: System intelligently records your last 10 used colors for quick reuse
👁️ Pixel Preview: Real-time preview of pixels to be drawn when hovering
 ℹ️ Pixel Info: Hover over existing pixels to view detailed info and creator identity
helpViewControlsText:
🔍 Smart Zoom: Use mouse wheel for smooth zooming (0.1x - 5x) with precise control
🖱️ Canvas Panning: Hold left mouse button for 500ms then drag to move canvas for wide-area browsing
🎯 View Reset: Click reset button to instantly restore default zoom and center position
⚡ Quick Zoom: Use top zoom in/out buttons for precise zoom control
⌨️ Keyboard Operations: Ctrl/Cmd + +/-/0 for quick zoom control, improving efficiency
📱 Touch Support: Mobile devices support pinch-to-zoom and single-finger drag operations
helpUserFeaturesText:
🔐 User Identity: Each user has unique ID for seamless cross-device synchronization
🛡️ Permission Management: Strict permission control, only edit your own pixels, protecting others' creations
💾 Incremental Saving: Smart saving mechanism, only transmits new pixel data, greatly improving performance
📊 Pixel Tracking: System precisely tracks every pixel added by users, optimizing storage and loading efficiency
⚡ Status Sync: Real-time display of unsaved changes status, with auto-save to prevent data loss
💿 Manual Save: Support save button click or Ctrl+S shortcut to immediately save all new pixels
🔄 Data Refresh: Click load button to fetch latest collaborative data from cloud
🌐 Four-Chunk System: Advanced chunk division technology optimizing large-scale pixel data management
helpShortcutsText:
💾 Ctrl/Cmd + S: Immediately save all new pixels to cloud
🔍 Ctrl/Cmd + +: Zoom in canvas view to see pixel details
🔍 Ctrl/Cmd + -: Zoom out canvas view to browse larger areas
🎯 Ctrl/Cmd + 0: Reset zoom to default size and center display
🖱️ Mouse wheel: Smooth canvas zooming with precise control
✋ Left mouse hold and drag: Pan canvas view to explore different areas
⌨️ ESC key: Quickly close current popup or modal
📱 Mobile: Pinch-to-zoom, single-finger drag, long-press for menu
helpStatusFeaturesText:
📊 Pixel Statistics: Real-time display of total pixels created by all users, reflecting community activity
🔴 Save Status: Red dot indicator when there are unsaved changes, ensuring data safety
📈 Session Statistics: Display new pixel count and operation records saved in current session
⚡ Loading Progress: Detailed four-chunk loading progress and system status during app startup
📍 Coordinate Display: Show precise coordinate position information when hovering over pixels
⚠️ Exit Protection: Confirmation prompt when leaving page with unsaved changes, preventing accidental loss
🔄 Chunk Status: Display loading status and cache status of four chunks
📱 Device Adaptation: Status information optimized for display on different devices
helpErrorHandlingText:
🚨 Smart Error Display: Full-screen display of clear error messages and specific solutions when problems occur
🔄 Auto Retry Mechanism: Retry button for network errors, supporting auto-reconnect and manual retry
🏷️ Error Classification Management: Precisely distinguish different error types (user auth, data save, chunk loading, etc.)
🌍 Multi-language Support: Error messages fully support Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese display
⚡ Auto Recovery System: Some temporary errors automatically attempt recovery, reducing user intervention
📋 Error Logging: Detailed error information recording for problem tracking and system optimization
🛠️ User Guidance: Provide clear operation suggestions and problem-solving steps

aboutProjectText: SAR Map Pixel is a modern collaborative pixel art platform supporting real-time multi-user drawing. Built with advanced four-chunk system architecture, each pixel is 16x16 in size, providing smooth drawing experience. Users have independent identity authentication with cross-device access, and can only edit their own pixel artworks. All data is synchronized through LeanCloud cloud services in real-time, ensuring data security and consistency.
aboutAIText: This project is 100% autonomously developed by artificial intelligence, covering Vue 3 frontend architecture design, responsive UI interface, user interaction logic, cloud data management, multi-language internationalization, performance optimization and other full-stack features. It demonstrates the exceptional capabilities of modern AI in complex web application development, from requirement analysis and architecture design to code implementation, completely completed independently by AI.
aboutOpenSourceText: The project adopts MIT open source license with fully open code: github.com/LoXidEv/SARMapPixel Core Tech Stack: • Frontend: Vue 3 + Composition API • Build: Vite + Modern Toolchain • Cloud: LeanCloud Database • I18n: Vue I18n Multi-language Support Welcome developers to contribute code, submit issues, or participate in feature discussions!
aboutTestingText: This platform serves as a technical demonstration and testing environment, primarily showcasing AI development capabilities and technical features. While it has complete functionality, long-term data persistence is not guaranteed. It is recommended for learning, testing, or temporary creative purposes. We will perform regular system maintenance and data cleanup, so please save important works promptly.
aboutTechnologyText:
🎨 Drawing System:
• 16x16 pixel block drawing for detailed creative experience
• Smart color management with automatic common color recording
• Multi-tool support: brush, eraser, color picker
• Real-time preview and coordinate display

🏗️ Four-Chunk Architecture:
• Intelligent chunk division optimizing large canvas performance
• On-demand loading mechanism reducing 93.75% network requests
• Independent caching system improving response speed
• Error isolation - single chunk failure doesn't affect overall system

☁️ Cloud Collaboration:
• LeanCloud real-time data synchronization
• Incremental saving, only transmitting new pixels
• Cross-device data consistency guarantee
• Smart conflict handling mechanism

🛡️ User Experience:
• Independent user identity system
• Permission isolation - only edit your own pixels
• Complete multi-language support (CN/EN/TC)
• Responsive design adapting to various devices
• Comprehensive error handling and retry mechanisms
